bug.author: rubenfiszel
bug.summary: Learning not as good as one example
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://gym.openai.com/evaluations/eval_TqZof2RFQnGin4l5na0sA>https://gym.openai.com/evaluations/eval_TqZof2RFQnGin4l5na0sA</denchmark-link>
This seems to be much more efficient than what rl4j achieve on Cartpole. The curve progress starts much earlier. Find out why (Implementation issue?).

comments.comment: Is this fixed with the release few days after this bug was filled? Or was this not an issue?
Yes, this was fixed by normalization. Thank you for remembering me to close it.
